card.name: Mystic Treasure Chest
card.text: ■ Search your deck. You may take a non-nature card from your deck and put it into your mana zone. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Trap Commune
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a race. Destroy any number of your creatures that have that race. Then destroy a number of your opponent's creatures equal to or less than the number of your creatures destroyed this way.

card.name: Streaming Tutor
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all fire and nature cards into your hand and put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Hyperspatial Bolshack Hole
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent’s creatures that has 3000 power or less. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Bolshack Dragon, the Temporal Blaze
card.text: ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. ■ Double Breaker ■ Awaken—When this creature wins a battle, Bolshack Möbius, Victory Awakened

card.name: Bolshack Möbius, Victory Awakened
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. ■ Triple Breaker ■ Release

card.name: Cyber G Hogan
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Chain Cascade ''(When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are creatures that cost less than this creature, you may put them into the battle zone. Put the rest of the cards on top of your deck in any order.)''

card.name: Tornado Shiva Double Cross, Blastdragon
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, search your deck. You may take a creature that has Double Cross in its name from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose 2 creatures in the battle zone. Those creatures battle. ''(They don't tap to battle.)'' ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Hyperspatial Energy Hole
card.text: ■ Draw a card. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a water psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Hyperspatial Faerie Hole
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a nature psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Hyperspatial Revive Hole
card.text: ■ Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a darkness psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Hyperspatial Shiny Hole
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a light psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Olzekia, General of Decapitation
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses 2 of their creatures and destroys them.

card.name: Great Chakra, the Storm Awakened
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Holy Field Ignore any effects that would prevent your creatures that have "blocker" from attacking. (''However, summoning sickness isn't ignored.'') ■ Triple Breaker ■ Release

card.name: Chakra, Temporal Thunder Dragon
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Holy Field Awaken—At the Step#Step 2 (Draw)

card.name: Tailspin Slash
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone get "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Zerokage, Lightfang Lord
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Ninja Strike ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Hayabusamaru, Lightfang Ninja
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature, one of your creatures gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Sanctuary of the Mother
card.text: ■ Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose an evolution creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Peace Lupia
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Leaf Storm Trap
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Hustle Castle
card.text: ■ Castle Fortify ■ Whenever you put a creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. ■ If the fortified shield isn't fortified by any other castles, whenever the fortified shield would be broken by your opponent's creatures, you may return one of your other shields to your hand instead.

card.name: Rose Castle
card.text: ■ Castle Fortify ■ Each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone gets -1000 power. ''(A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)''

card.name: Murmur, Vizier of Formation
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that have "blocker" gets +3000 power.

card.name: Hanzou, Menacing Phantom
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -6000 power until the End Step ■ When this creature would be destroyed and you have at least one darkness card in your mana zone, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard instead.

card.name: Huckle Kirin Sawyer, Jungle Governor
card.text: ■ Mana Evolution ■ Shield Force

card.name: Shrine of Rebirth
card.text: ■ Put up to 2 cards from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Ponkichi, the Patched Pulverizer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Marshall Touch

card.name: Kiryu Jilves, Gaia's Roar
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your creatures gets "slayer" and "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Franz the 1st, the Ice Fang
card.text: ■ Your spells may each cost 1 less to cast. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: The Door of Miracle and Mystery
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Shield Trigger ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Your opponent chooses a non-evolution creature from among them and you put it into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Masato, the Marauding Captain
card.text: ■ Marshall Touch

card.name: Super Explosive Duel Fire
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy all creatures that have "blocker".

card.name: Ogre Kaiser "Destruction"
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's psychic creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Perfect Madonna, Channeler of Suns
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, if this creature has more than 0 power, it stays in the battle zone instead.

card.name: Byoito, Holy Cyber Protector
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Light or water cards that have "blocker" added to your hand from your shield zone get "shield trigger".

card.name: Massugu, Fighting Ogre
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Your Human evolution creatures may each cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Laurier, Ogre Princess
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you don't have a shield, search your deck. You may take a file:Victory Rare.png
